amendment.description: To authorize the Attorney General to delay or deny the transfer of firearms and explosives and issuance of Federal firearms and explosives licenses and permits to known or suspected terrorists.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 4859 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 67 - 31. Record Vote Number: 110.

Amendment SA 4859 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Johnson to Amendment SA 4858 (the instructions of the motion to commit). (consideration: CR 4530, S4535) To authorize the Attorney General to delay or deny the transfer of firearms and explosives and issuance of Federal firearms and explosives licenses and permits to known or suspected terrorists.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4859 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Johnson to Amendment SA 4858 (the instructions of the motion to commit).
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 4859 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 67 - 31. Record Vote Number: 110.
